data.name: IntroPart3
data.value: . Each year, dozens of Rovers come together to share a unique moment of friendship, fraternity, and challenges in the heart of winter.

data.name: ProvincialDescription
data.value: Organized by and for Rovers, the Carrefour Polaire brings together around a hundred young adults aged 17 to 25 from across the province. It‚Äôs the perfect occasion to break isolation, build connections, and share our experiences.

data.name: WhyCarrefourPart2
data.value: is a key milestone in the journey: a meeting point where clans gather to reflect, recharge, plan, and live a shared experience. The Carrefour Polaire is its winter version, where snow and cold become part of the adventure.

data.name: ExperienceDescription
data.value: More than just a weekend, the Carrefour Polaire is a life experience that has marked the Rover path for over thirty years. It embodies the three key dimensions of the program: adventure, service, and reflection.

data.name: ThemeText
data.value: It‚Äôs going to be fire üî•! Get ready for a Carrefour Polaire full of energy and human warmth‚Ä¶ even in the middle of winter!
